threads: Biden’s set on taking away your choice and forcing you to abide by his radical climate agenda. Un-American!
text: biden pushing a climate agenda is the least un-american thing lol. y'all cry freedom but only when it's convenient. saving the planet is rad, wake up.

persona.name: Male College Student Know-it-all Youth Language Radical Left
